intro: An incredible and amazing adventure is now in the format of a TV show!
description:
Are you ready for new experiences? Meet “Family Roadshow: Hidden Adventures” an exciting hidden object game where you will become a participant in a grandiose travel TV show! 
Together with the presenters of the program, you will travel to the most picturesque corners of the planet — from Hawaiian beaches to the mountains of South Korea, from big cities to hidden treasures of nature.
Find hidden objects, solve fascinating puzzles and collect collectible souvenirs in the unique atmosphere of your favorite TV show.
Treat yourself to a unique journey through 30 amazing and extraordinary places around the world! 
You can visit historical sites, stroll through national parks, and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature and cities. 
The game will give you the opportunity to use your skills and knowledge to complete the mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:
- 10 additional exclusive locations
- 10 additional mini-games, as well as 12 puzzles for real fans
- 30 unique souvenirs for your collection room
